description: Discord Bot used to get Paladins stats and preform other tasks to help with custom games.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Token used for authentication. This is the token generated to your Discord Bot

HIREZ_DEV_ID.description: DevId used for Pyrez to authentication. This is the developer ID that you receive from Hi-Rez Studios.

HIREZ_AUTH_ID.description: AuthId used for Pyrez to authentication. This is the authentication key that you receive from Hi-Rez Studios.

name: Paladins Discord Helper Bot
